cbinstall.description: CB GroupJive Forums integration adding Category and Group forum support. Configured from within GroupJive Configuration when published.

param.name: groups_forums_category
param.label: Category
param.description: Select the forum category for all group forums.

param.name: groups_forums_back
param.label: Backlink
param.description: Enable or disable display of backlink to return to a forum categories group.

param.name: groups_forums_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: groups_forums_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed.

param.name: groups_forums_search
param.label: Search
param.description: Enable or disable usage of search on rows.
